#################################################

Release Name:
Alchemy.Deluxe.(PopCap.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Alchemy Deluxe
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 500MHz or better
RAM: 128MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Alchemy Deluxe_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Your goal is to turn the game board into gold by placing ancient ruins into the correct configuration. Success depends on planning and recognition of opportunities. Discover all new level backgrounds and mystery gems. Save high scores for posterity and remember: there's much more Alchemy to match wits against! Own this challenging puzzle game and conjure up fun offline ... anytime!
